name: fuzzy-find
title: Fuzzy Find
description: Blazing fast fuzzy file/folder search using fd and fzf
author: nicksergeant

commands.name: search-files-folders
commands.title: Search Files
commands.subtitle: File Search
commands.description: Search for files and folders on your Mac.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
